Isabella Rodriguez.description: still working at the counter, taking orders and chatting with customers @ the Ville:Hobbs Cafe:cafe:behind the cafe counter

Maria Lopez.description: conversing about Maria Lopez and Klaus Mueller making plans to meet at Hobbs Cafe for lunch after Klaus finishes his final draft of his paper @ <persona> Klaus Mueller
chat: Hey Klaus, how's your paper coming along?
Hey Maria, it's coming along well. I'm almost done with the final draft.
That's great to hear! Want to grab a bite to eat after you're done?
Sure, that sounds great. I could use a break after this. What are you in the mood for?
How about we go to Hobbs Cafe? I was planning on getting some food there anyway.
That sounds perfect. Let's head over to Hobbs Cafe once I finish up here.
Great! I'll see you once you're done then.
I think I just need another 10-15 minutes to wrap things up here. How about we meet at Hobbs Cafe around 1:30 pm?
Sounds like a plan! I'll see you at 1:30 pm at Hobbs Cafe.
Great, looking forward to it. I'll see you at Hobbs Cafe at 1:30 pm then!
I'll start packing up here and head over to Hobbs Cafe. See you soon!
Awesome, I'll see you soon then!
I'm all done here now, heading to Hobbs Cafe. See you soon!
Great, see you at Hobbs Cafe soon!
Hey Maria, I'm here at Hobbs Cafe now. Where are you seated?
